document_data.name: Tannin
document_data.mainbody: '''Tannin''' was a [[human]] [[bard]] and a member of the adventuring group, the [[Moor Runners]].
document_data.History: In [[1364 DR]], Tannin was killed by the [[red dragon]] [[Rylatar'ralah'tyma]] when she attacked the caravan he was with just outside of [[Hill's Edge]].
